title: Ford Mondeo Hybrid review: not the diesel alternative you’re looking for
text:
Once, a long time ago, your humble correspondent drove around Europe with three friends in an early Ford Mondeo Estate he had bought, partly for the purposes of the trip and partly because even at the callow age of 18 he knew that large estates were cool. (Either that or he was old before his time. You decide.)

One of us almost drove that poor Mondeo into a lane closure barrier while distractedly faffing with the stereo; another hit a dislodged drain cover at 40mph, causing a most almighty clunk from around the sump area; then there was the time we left a campsite forgetting to close the boot properly, spewing our belongings all over the road.

All this without mentioning the countless miles...
